mapper.select: select su.user_name AS userName,( (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.smt_order where schedule_status = 3 and create_user_id = su.user_id and delivery_date like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%'))+ (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.mes_schedule where status = 3 and create_user_id = su.user_id and modified_time like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%'))+ (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.smt_work_order where work_order_status = 4 and create_user_id = su.user_id and modified_time like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%'))+ (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.wms_in_finished_product where in_status = 2 and create_user_id = su.user_id and modified_time like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%'))+ (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.wms_out_shipping_note where out_status = 2 and create_user_id = su.user_id and modified_time like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%'))+ (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.wms_out_delivery_order where out_status = 2 and create_user_id = su.user_id and modified_time like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%'))+ (select count(*) from fantech_imes_v2.wms_out_otherout where otherout_status = 2 and create_user_id = su.user_id and modified_time like CONCAT((select curdate()),'%')) ) workload from ocean_v2.sys_user su

SELECT empNumber, name, documentCode, documentType, businessDate, remark FROM ( SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',wodo.delivery_order_code AS 'documentCode','出库单' AS 'documentType',wodo.modified_time AS 'businessDate',wodo.remark from fantech_imes_v2.wms_out_delivery_order wodo left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = wodo.create_user_id where wodo.out_status = 2 UNION SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',swo.work_order_code AS 'documentCode','工单' AS 'documentType',swo.modified_time AS 'businessDate',swo.remark from fantech_imes_v2.smt_work_order swo left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = swo.create_user_id where work_order_status = 4 UNION SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',so.order_code AS 'documentCode','销售订单' AS 'documentType',so.delivery_date AS 'businessDate',so.remark from fantech_imes_v2.smt_order so left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = so.create_user_id where so.schedule_status = 3 UNION SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',ms.schedule_code AS 'documentCode','排产单' AS 'documentType',ms.modified_time AS 'businessDate',ms.remark from fantech_imes_v2.mes_schedule ms left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = ms.create_user_id where ms.status = 3 UNION SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',wifp.finished_product_code AS 'documentCode','成品入库单' AS 'documentType',wifp.modified_time AS 'businessDate',wifp.remark from fantech_imes_v2.wms_in_finished_product wifp left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = wifp.create_user_id where wifp.in_status = 2 UNION SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',wosn.shipping_note_code AS 'documentCode','出货通知单' AS 'documentType',wosn.modified_time AS 'businessDate',wosn.remark from fantech_imes_v2.wms_out_shipping_note wosn left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = wosn.create_user_id where wosn.out_status = 2 UNION SELECT su.user_code AS 'empNumber',su.user_name AS 'name',woo.otherout_code AS 'documentCode','杂出单号' AS 'documentType',woo.modified_time AS 'businessDate',woo.remark from fantech_imes_v2.wms_out_otherout woo left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON su.user_id = woo.create_user_id where woo.otherout_status = 2 ) AS ew
ew.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ew.empNumber like CONCAT('%', #{empNumber}, '%')
and date_format(ew.businessDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by ew.businessDate desc
